price: 6 Tu reçois, en vérité, le Coran de la part d’un dieu Sage et Omniscient.
arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-innaka latulaqqā al-qur'āna min ladun ḥakīmin ʿalīmin
